verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician <WH5329> upon Gittith, <WH1665> A Psalm <WH4210> for the sons <WH1121> of Korah. <WH7141> How <WH4100> amiable <WH3039> are your tabernacles, <WH4908> O LORD <WH3068> of hosts! <WH6635>

My soul <WH5315> longs, <WH3700> yes, <WH1571> even <WH1571> faints <WH3615> for the courts <WH2691> of the LORD: <WH3068> my heart <WH3820> and my flesh <WH1320> cries <WH7442> out for the living <WH2416> God. <WH410>

Yes, <WH1571> the sparrow <WH6833> has found <WH4672> an house, <WH1004> and the swallow <WH1866> a nest <WH7064> for herself, where <WH834> she may lay <WH7896> her young, <WH667> even <WH853> your altars, <WH4196> O LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> my King, <WH4428> and my God. <WH430>
Blessed <WH835> are they that dwell <WH3427> in your house: <WH1004> they will be still <WH5750> praising <WH1984> you. Selah. <WH5542>
Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> whose strength <WH5797> is in you; in whose heart <WH3824> are the ways <WH4546> of them.
Who passing <WH5674> through the valley <WH6010> of Baca <WH1056> make <WH6213> it a well; <WH4599> the rain <WH4175> also <WH1571> fills <WH5844> the pools. <WH1293>
They go <WH3212> from strength <WH2428> to strength, <WH2428> every one of them in Zion <WH6726> appears <WH7200> before <WH413> God. <WH430>
O LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of hosts, <WH6635> hear <WH8085> my prayer: <WH8605> give ear, <WH238> O God <WH430> of Jacob. <WH3290> Selah. <WH5542>
Behold, <WH7200> O God <WH430> our shield, <WH4043> and look <WH5027> on the face <WH6440> of your anointed. <WH4899>

For a day <WH3117> in your courts <WH2691> is better <WH2896> than a thousand. <WH505> I had rather <WH977> be a doorkeeper <WH5605> in the house <WH1004> of my God, <WH430> than to dwell <WH1752> in the tents <WH168> of wickedness. <WH7562>

For the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> is a sun <WH8121> and shield: <WH4043> the LORD <WH3068> will give <WH5414> grace <WH2580> and glory: <WH3519> no <WH3808> good <WH2896> thing will he withhold <WH4513> from them that walk <WH1980> uprightly. <WH8549>
O LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> that trusts <WH982> in you.
